Name: Midnight Blues
About the game: A mysterious detective tracks down two highly-skilled criminals, threatening to turn the NYPD on them if they don't carry out his plans of purging a local crime family. Join them on a path of misery, regret, and violence. It's only a matter of time before the strings being pulled start to tangle... • 20 levels • 5 playable characters • 33 weapons • Synthwave/Darksynth soundtrack by various artists WARNING: THIS GAME IS RAGE-INDUCING!
Meta Title: Midnight Blues: Sep 30, 2021, Mebstro and Full Overview
